name: The Dark (itch) (Kroll_The_Kroll)
description:
You were walking through the woods when you suddenly found a strange crack in the ground. After taking the necessary equipment, you went down into this gap, but something went wrong and you fell down hard hitting...

                               Gameplay 

1. Solve puzzles to advance.

2. Read notes, they will help.

3. Be quiet...

Don't try to die, it won't lead to anything.

In case of errors, write in the comments.

                      ANSWERS (if difficult)

1.Combination lock in the pantry 953

2. Drawer with buttons 120736

3.Control panel:

K-1>K-5>Y2>Y0>E6>F8>3G>3L>M4

4. Turn on the TV, and scroll through the channels, there will be a code.

                          Have a nice game!
